JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description              What will your job look like             Involved in application development and code review of the team members.            Manage, collaborate and coordinate the work with the management team.            Organize and facilitate project planning, daily stand-up meetings, reviews, retrospectives, sprint, release planning, demos, and other Scrum-related meetings            Track and communicate team velocity and sprint/release progress            Execute and prepare test cases               All you need is...          2 to 5 years of experience in developing Full-stack enterprise application development with JAVA, Python, Angular,        Experience in developing Spring boot micro services        Experience in SOAP/RESTful web services, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, JSON, Ajax        Experience working with RDBMS such as SQL Server, Oracle        Experience working on GIT/Bit Bucket            Why you will love this job:      You will be challenged to design and develop new software applications.    You will have the opportunity to work in a growing organization, with ever growing opportunities for personal growth.
